basic.description:
This seminar offers an in-depth study of a topic in North American Indigenous arts and visual culture, including theoretical and methodological readings.
LEARNING HOURS    126 (36S;90P)
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Studies in Indigenous Arts and Visual Culture of North America

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    A GPA of 2.6 in a minium of 24.0 units in ARTH and Level 4 and registration in an ARTH Major or Medial Plan.
